Package ch.unige.ng.fitness

Interface Summary
Fitness<T> This interface modelize a fitness function.
GPFitness<T> n-genes This interface determines a fitness that is used for genetic programming.
UndeterministicFitness Classes implementing this interface inform that the fitness is not deterministic: Two computation of the same individuals will not necesseraly give the same result.
 

Class Summary
DoubleMaxOnes Stupid fitness that calculate the maxOnes with double: If the value is bigger than 0.5.
FormulaFitness This class calculates the fitness of an individual.
GrayCodeFitness This class is used to calculate a fitness.
MaxOnes The fitness can only be applied to a BooleanGene Individual.
MultipleFormulaFitness This fitness calculates the sum of the equation on each gene.
SizeFitness<T> n-genes

This fitness lower the quality of a Fitness depending on the size of the individual
